userInput.name: WIOTP_DEVICE_TOKEN
userInput.label: The Device token created in the Watson IoT Platform to use in sending MQTT data

userInput.name: WIOTP_DEVICE_ID
userInput.label: The Device id created in the Watson IoT Platform to use in sending MQTT data

userInput.name: WIOTP_DEVICE_TYPE
userInput.label: The Device type created in the Watson IoT Platform to use in sending MQTT data

userInput.name: WIOTP_ORG
userInput.label: The org assigned by Watson IoT Platform to use in sending MQTT data
